DOC.HEADLINE: BRIEFLY : ECONOMY
DOC.TEXT: Weather and Quake Slow Production Rise : Industrial production kept rising in January , but more slowly because of severe weather and the Northridge earthquake , the federal_government said . Economists said output will pick_up in the first_half of 1994 , led by automobiles . The Federal_Reserve said factory output was held to a 0.2 % gain last month , but production overall still rose 0.5 % .
